title: A Note on Copying Over Information
description: I would like to ask that before you copy over info from the old wiki, or old posts, please verify that it is up to date, and make any changes if necessary. We don't want to be giving wrong information, even no information is better than that.

replies.body:
In my opinion, writing from scratch is the best way to provide information as you have to look on the mod to know what you are doing.
Like i did.
